data.title: Byron Anthony Kujala
data.meta_description: 08 Dec 1946 - 14 Sept 2019 It is with sadness we say farewell to a beautiful soul that has enriched the lives of family and friends. data.text:
08 Dec 1946 – 14 Sept 2019

It is with sadness we say farewell to a beautiful soul that has enriched the lives of family and friends.

Byron is predeceased by his mother, Sylvia Kujala and father, Elmer Kujala and son, Dean R.L. Kujala.

Byron has left behind his children, Vincent, Cheryl-Anne and daughter-in-law Wylene; grandchildren, Oria, Faith and David; siblings, Ron (Pat), Ken (JC), Carol (Don), Loretta (Paul) and David (Dawna); many cousins, nieces and nephews. He had many treasured friends that have walked the road alongside Byron.

Ashes will be returned to his family homestead at Sylvan Lake, Alberta.

There will be an informal small drop-in for sharing memories on Thursday 19 Sept 2019 anytime from 1pm to 4pm at Unit 12, 10471 Resthaven Drive, Sidney BC (street parking on Resthaven). Please RSVP to Cheryl-Anne at 780-983-8835 (text or phone). Feel free to bring pictures and stories to share.

Donations warmly accepted to a hospice of your choice in

Byron’s memory.

Offer Condolence for the family of Byron Anthony Kujala

Print Obituary & Condolences
